sources.title: El Hijo De Gabino Barrera ( 1965)
sources.description: El hijo del muerto Gabino Barrera quiere vengar a su padre y convoca a los campesinos para no vender los frutos de su trabajo a un par de acaparadores.

metadata.Plot: After a man goes back to his father's, he has flashbacks of a man he never met and goes on a quest to discover who killed his father; meanwhile, a dangerous homesteader steals from the poor and keeps everything for himself.
metadata.Actors: Antonio Aguilar, Jaime Fernández, Martha Dual
